page.title: 07Fairfield Juniors, C'mouth.
page.content: {Fairfield Junior School}is 14 years old and is situated by Fairfield Car Park and the Cockermouth Auction Market. The school is a modern one and open plan. There are{260 children}aged from 7 to 11. Ten teachers work there. The{headmaster}is called{Mr K. Dorman and the deputy head is Mr Lowrey. Mr Holmes is the school caretaker. The school has its own orchestra consisting of pianists, violinists, drummers etc...Fairfield publishes its own magazine every year,Everybody does a piece of work for it and gives it to the editors who decide who's work is to go in to the magazine. Fairfield has a kitchen and a canteen. Most people have school dinners but some people take packed lunches.
